name: Darker Dungeon
description:
A simple rogue-lite 2D dungeon crawler, going around collecting items and beating goblins! Demo of original design, currently game is endless. Descend as many floors as you can! For playing blind, listen to sound cues when moving and entering rooms.

Controls

  • Movement: WASD
  • Attacks (ranged within 2 tiles):
    • J: Ice orb
    • K: Fire orb
    • L: Lightning orb
  • Skip turn: Tab
  • Hear room cues: Left shift
  • Darken screen: esc
